amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the non-federal interest to execute a project or project component when they determine that it can be done at lower cost and/or faster time. Also, the amendment directs 20% of the cost savings back to the United States Treasury for deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 233 (Roll no. 568).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 233 (Roll no. 568).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
